story_teamaquamagma_02_06000/2401_1001_0:
So, I’ve just been told we have to quiet down
Groudon and Kyogre.
So Steven’s gonna stop the meteor?

In that case, failure’s not gonna be an option
for us!

Yeah! We have to stop these Pokémon, whatever
it takes!

We’ve got enough problems trying to stop this
rampage, but a giant meteor on top of that?

This situation is beyond Team Magma and
Team Aqua...
We just have to hope their plan succeeds...

Darn it! Ain’t there anything we can do other than
sit back and watch?
Look at us, so proud of our grand ideals...
story_teamaquamagma_02_06000/2401_1001_1:
Yet we are utterly powerless before the marvels
of nature!
